types.name: Root

actions.name: configure
actions.description: Configures the 'membrane-meta-driver' program with the provided token

actions.name: action
actions.description: Performs an action within the 'membrane-meta-driver' program. The gref parameter is optional

actions.name: query
actions.description: Queries the 'membrane-meta-driver' program. The query and ref parameters are optional

fields.name: programs
fields.description: Collection of programs associated with 'membrane-meta-driver' program

types.description: A Node representing the root of the program schema 'membrane-meta-driver'. It provides actions to configure, perform actions, and query the program. It also contains fields for program collection, status, and tests.

types.name: ProgramCollection

fields.name: one

params.name: pid
params.description: The process ID (PID) of the program to retrieve.

fields.description: Accesses a single program in the 'membrane-meta-driver' schema.

fields.name: page

params.name: include_schemas
params.description: Specifies whether to include schemas in the program page response.

params.name: include_expressions
params.description: Specifies whether to include expressions in the program page response.

fields.description: Accesses a program page in the 'membrane-meta-driver' schema.

types.description: Collection of programs in the program schema 'membrane-meta-driver'. It contains fields for retrieving a single program and accessing program pages.

types.name: ProgramPage
types.description: A page of programs in the program schema 'membrane-meta-driver'. It contains fields for retrieving a list of programs and accessing the next page of programs.

types.name: Program

fields.name: pid
fields.description: The process ID of the program.

types.description: A program in the membrane-meta-driver schema. It contains fields for program name, pid, status, endpoint, schema, and expressions. It also provides an action to terminate the program.

types.name: Tests
types.description: A set of tests for the program schema 'membrane-meta-driver'. It provides an action to test getting programs.
